snippet.title: HeroesTD Trailer Opening
snippet.description:
GEAR UP TO START YOUR ADVENTURE! 🎉

The Aeon Disk is opened up before us! Not so long more, we could build Heroes Deck for our own adventure to conquer this mysterious and mesmerizing world. Each hero comes with specific features and skills, waiting for you to explore!

Armor up, our heroes, and be ready to fight evil to save the world together!
----------------------------------
Be the earliest player of #HeroesTD - A 3D tower defense strategy game built on Heroes Metaverse platform.
Official Channels 👇
🌐Website: https://www.heroestd.io/
🌐Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Heroestd
🌐Twitter: https://twitter.com/heroes_td
🌐Discord: https://dsc.gg/heroestd
🌐Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/HeroesTD/
🌐Medium: https://medium.com/@heroestd
🌐Telegram Announcement: https://t.me/HeroesTD_Club
🌐Telegram Chat: https://t.me/Heroes_TD
🌐Telegram Vietnamese: https://t.me/heroestdvietnam 
🌐Telegram Español: https://t.me/heroestdES
🌐Telegram Philippines: https://t.me/heroestdphillipines
🌐Telegram Chinese: https://t.me/heroestdCN
🌐Telegram Arab: https://t.me/HeroestdArab
🌐Telegram Brazil: https://t.me/HeroesTDBrazil
